title: Directorsâ€™ report
content: 201N.- (1) The Directors of each of the merging Cyprus companies shall draw up a report intended for the members thereof, explaining and justifying the legal and economic aspects of the cross-border merger and explaining the implications of the cross-border merger for members, creditors and employees. (2) The report shall be made available to the members and to the representatives of the employees or, where there are no such representatives, to the employees themselves, not less than one month before the date of the general meeting referred to in section 201P. (3) Where the Directors receive, in good time, an opinion from the representatives of the employees of the company, the said opinion shall be appended to the report. Independent expert report. 2 of 186(I) of 2007.
